Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh's early strikes (2 wickets in 2.1 overs)
India chased 128 with 49 balls to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Three men retained from the T20 World Cup-winning side
Arshdeep approaching the top of wickets chart for India
Mayank Yadav starting his T20I career with a maiden over
Varun Chakravarthy returning to the India XI after three years
Post-Match Reflections: India's dominance over Bangladesh in T20Is
Arshdeep Singh's impressive performance leading the attack
Mayank Yadav's promising start to his T20I career
India's efficient chase with 49 balls to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh losing Litton Das early in the innings
Bangladesh's only hope being ring rust due to inactivity
Sanju Samson's quick 29s at the start of the chase
Pandya's no-look ramp over the keeper's head
